description: Troutco is an innovative aquaculture initiative focused on exporting high-quality rainbow trout while promoting sustainability and social responsibility. Established over 16 years ago, it operates primarily in Colombia's central western region, empowering local rural women and utilizing water resources efficiently. With a commitment to circular economy practices, Troutco produces various trout products, ensuring 80% of its output is exported, primarily to the USA and Canada, while also contributing to local communities through food donations and educational support.
name: Troutco
